transpose_mem_iff:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.transpose -/
@[simp]
theorem transpose_mem_iff : matrix.transpose A ∈ symplectic_group l R ↔ A ∈ symplectic_group l R :=
  ⟨fun hA => by simpa using transpose_mem hA, transpose_mem⟩
#align transpose_mem_iff transpose_mem_iff
transpose_mem:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.transpose -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.transpose -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.transpose -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.transpose -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.transpose -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.transpose -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.transpose -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.transpose -/
theorem transpose_mem (hA : A ∈ symplectic_group l R) : matrix.transpose A ∈ symplectic_group l R :=
  by
  rw [mem_iff] at hA⊢
  rw [transpose_transpose]
  have huA := symplectic_det hA
  have huAT : is_unit (matrix.transpose A).det :=
    by
    rw [matrix.det_transpose]
    exact huA
  calc
    matrix.mul (matrix.mul (matrix.transpose A) (J l R)) A =
        matrix.mul (matrix.mul (-matrix.transpose A) (J l R)⁻¹) A :=
      by
      rw [J_inv]
      simp
    _ = matrix.mul (matrix.mul (-matrix.transpose A) (matrix.mul (matrix.mul A (J l R)) (matrix.transpose A))⁻¹) A := by
      rw [hA]
    _ =
        matrix.mul (matrix.mul (-matrix.mul (matrix.transpose A) (matrix.mul (matrix.transpose A)⁻¹ (J l R)⁻¹)) A⁻¹)
          A :=
      by simp only [matrix.mul_inv_rev, matrix.mul_assoc, matrix.neg_mul]
    _ = -(J l R)⁻¹ := by rw [mul_nonsing_inv_cancel_left _ _ huAT, nonsing_inv_mul_cancel_right _ _ huA]
    _ = J l R := by simp [J_inv]
    
#align transpose_mem transpose_mem
symplectic_det:
theorem symplectic_det (hA : A ∈ symplectic_group l R) : is_unit <| det A :=
  by
  rw [isUnit_iff_exists_inv]
  use A.det
  refine' (is_unit_det_J l R).mul_left_cancel _
  rw [mul_one]
  rw [mem_iff] at hA
  apply_fun det  at hA
  simp only [det_mul, det_transpose] at hA
  rw [mul_comm A.det, mul_assoc] at hA
  exact hA
#align symplectic_det symplectic_det
neg_mem:
theorem neg_mem (h : A ∈ symplectic_group l R) : -A ∈ symplectic_group l R :=
  by
  rw [mem_iff] at h⊢
  simp [h]
#align neg_mem neg_mem
mem_iff':
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.transpose -/
theorem mem_iff' : A ∈ symplectic_group l R ↔ matrix.mul (matrix.mul (matrix.transpose A) (J l R)) A = J l R := by
  rw [← transpose_mem_iff, mem_iff, transpose_transpose]
#align mem_iff' mem_iff'
mem_iff:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.transpose -/
theorem mem_iff {A : matrix (Sum l l) (Sum l l) R} :
    A ∈ symplectic_group l R ↔ matrix.mul (matrix.mul A (J l R)) (matrix.transpose A) = J l R := by
  simp [symplectic_group]
#align mem_iff mem_iff
is_unit_det_J:
theorem is_unit_det_J : is_unit (det (J l R)) :=
  isUnit_iff_exists_inv.mpr ⟨det (J l R), J_det_mul_J_det _ _⟩
#align is_unit_det_J is_unit_det_J
inv_left_mul_aux:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.transpose -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.transpose -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.transpose -/
theorem inv_left_mul_aux (hA : A ∈ symplectic_group l R) :
    -matrix.mul (matrix.mul (matrix.mul (J l R) (matrix.transpose A)) (J l R)) A = 1 :=
  calc
    -matrix.mul (matrix.mul (matrix.mul (J l R) (matrix.transpose A)) (J l R)) A =
        matrix.mul (-J l R) (matrix.mul (matrix.mul (matrix.transpose A) (J l R)) A) :=
      by simp only [matrix.mul_assoc, matrix.neg_mul]
    _ = matrix.mul (-J l R) (J l R) := by
      rw [mem_iff'] at hA
      rw [hA]
    _ = «expr • » (-1 : R) (matrix.mul (J l R) (J l R)) := by simp only [matrix.neg_mul, neg_smul, one_smul]
    _ = «expr • » (-1 : R) (-1) := by rw [J_squared]
    _ = 1 := by simp only [neg_smul_neg, one_smul]
    
#align inv_left_mul_aux inv_left_mul_aux
inv_eq_symplectic_inv:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.transpose -/
theorem inv_eq_symplectic_inv (A : matrix (Sum l l) (Sum l l) R) (hA : A ∈ symplectic_group l R) :
    A⁻¹ = matrix.mul (matrix.mul (-J l R) (matrix.transpose A)) (J l R) :=
  inv_eq_left_inv (by simp only [matrix.neg_mul, inv_left_mul_aux hA])
#align inv_eq_symplectic_inv inv_eq_symplectic_inv
coe_inv':
theorem coe_inv' (A : symplectic_group l R) : (↑A⁻¹ : matrix (Sum l l) (Sum l l) R) = A⁻¹ :=
  by
  refine' (coe_inv A).trans (inv_eq_left_inv _).symm
  simp [inv_left_mul_aux, coe_inv]
#align coe_inv' coe_inv'
coe_inv:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.transpose -/
theorem coe_inv (A : symplectic_group l R) :
    (↑A⁻¹ : matrix _ _ _) = matrix.mul (matrix.mul (-J l R) (matrix.transpose ↑A)) (J l R) :=
  rfl
#align coe_inv coe_inv
coe_J:
@[simp]
theorem coe_J : ↑(sym_J l R) = J l R :=
  rfl
#align coe_J coe_J
J_transpose:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.transpose -/
/-

@[simp]
theorem J_transpose : matrix.transpose (J l R) = -J l R :=
  by
  rw [J, from_blocks_transpose, ← neg_one_smul R (from_blocks _ _ _ _), from_blocks_smul, matrix.transpose_zero,
    matrix.transpose_one, transpose_neg]
  simp [from_blocks]
#align J_transpose J_transpose
J_squared:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
theorem J_squared : matrix.mul (J l R) (J l R) = -1 :=
  by
  rw [J, from_blocks_multiply]
  simp only [matrix.zero_mul, matrix.neg_mul, zero_add, neg_zero, matrix.one_mul, add_zero]
  rw [← neg_zero, ← matrix.from_blocks_neg, ← from_blocks_one]
#align J_squared J_squared
J_mem:
theorem J_mem : J l R ∈ symplectic_group l R :=
  by
  rw [mem_iff, J, from_blocks_multiply, from_blocks_transpose, from_blocks_multiply]
  simp
#align J_mem J_mem
J_inv:
theorem J_inv : (J l R)⁻¹ = -J l R := by
  refine' matrix.inv_eq_right_inv _
  rw [matrix.mul_neg, J_squared]
  exact neg_neg 1
#align J_inv J_inv
J_det_mul_J_det:
theorem J_det_mul_J_det : det (J l R) * det (J l R) = 1 :=
  by
  rw [← det_mul, J_squared]
  rw [← one_smul R (-1 : matrix _ _ R)]
  rw [smul_neg, ← neg_smul, det_smul]
  simp only [fintype.card_sum, det_one, mul_one]
  apply Even.neg_one_pow
  exact even_add_self _
#align J_det_mul_J_det J_det_mul_J_det
